aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the tags attached to a Lex resource

ListAggregatedUtterances.description: Grants permission to list utterances and statistics for a bot

ListBotAliases.description: Grants permission to list bot aliases in an bot

ListBotChannels.description: Grants permission to list bot channels

ListBotLocales.description: Grants permission to list bot locales in a bot

ListBotRecommendations.description: Grants permission to get a list of bot recommendations that meet the specified criteria

ListBotVersions.description: Grants permission to list existing bot versions

ListIntents.description: Grants permission to list intents in a bot

ListRecommendedIntents.description: Grants permission to get a list of recommended intents provided by the bot recommendation

ListSlotTypes.description: Grants permission to list slot types in a bot

ListSlots.description: Grants permission to list slots in an intent

SearchAssociatedTranscripts.description: Grants permission to search for associated transcripts that meet the specified criteria

ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to lists tags for a Lex resource

DescribeBot.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing bot

DescribeBotChannel.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing bot channel

DescribeBotLocale.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing bot locale

DescribeBotRecommendation.description: Grants permission to retrieve metadata information about a bot recommendation

DescribeBotVersion.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing bot version

DescribeCustomVocabulary.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing custom vocabulary

DescribeCustomVocabularyMetadata.description: Grants permission to retrieve metadata of an existing custom vocabulary

DescribeExport.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing export

DescribeImport.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing import

DescribeIntent.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing intent

DescribeResourcePolicy.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing resource policy for a Lex resource

DescribeSlot.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing slot

DescribeSlotType.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing slot type

CreateBotVersion.description: Grants permission to create a new version of an existing bot

DeleteBot.description: Grants permission to delete an existing bot

DeleteBotVersion.description: Grants permission to delete an existing bot version

DeleteIntent.description: Grants permission to delete an existing intent in a bot locale

DeleteSlotType.description: Grants permission to delete an existing slot type in a bot locale

DeleteUtterances.description: Grants permission to delete utterance data for a bot

StartImport.description: Grants permission to start a new import with the uploaded import file

aws:TagKeys.description: Filters access by the set of tag keys in the request

aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the tags in the request

BuildBotLocale.description: Grants permission to build an existing bot locale in a bot

CreateBot.description: Grants permission to create a new bot and a test bot alias pointing to the DRAFT bot version

aws:TagKeys.description: Filters access by the set of tag keys in the request

aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the tags in the request

CreateBotChannel.description: Grants permission to create a bot channel in an existing bot

CreateBotLocale.description: Grants permission to create a new bot locale in an existing bot

CreateCustomVocabulary.description: Grants permission to create a new custom vocabulary in an existing bot locale

CreateExport.description: Grants permission to create an export for an existing resource

CreateIntent.description: Grants permission to create a new intent in an existing bot locale

CreateResourcePolicy.description: Grants permission to create a new resource policy for a Lex resource

CreateSlot.description: Grants permission to create a new slot in an intent

CreateSlotType.description: Grants permission to create a new slot type in an existing bot locale

DeleteBotChannel.description: Grants permission to delete an existing bot channel

DeleteBotLocale.description: Grants permission to delete an existing bot locale in a bot

DeleteCustomVocabulary.description: Grants permission to delete an existing custom vocabulary in a bot locale

DeleteExport.description: Grants permission to delete an existing export

DeleteImport.description: Grants permission to delete an existing import

DeleteResourcePolicy.description: Grants permission to delete an existing resource policy for a Lex resource

DeleteSlot.description: Grants permission to delete an existing slot in an intent

StartBotRecommendation.description: Grants permission to start a bot recommendation for an existing bot locale

UpdateBot.description: Grants permission to update an existing bot

UpdateBotLocale.description: Grants permission to update an existing bot locale

UpdateBotRecommendation.description: Grants permission to update an existing bot recommendation request

UpdateCustomVocabulary.description: Grants permission to update an existing custom vocabulary

UpdateExport.description: Grants permission to update an existing export

UpdateIntent.description: Grants permission to update an existing intent

UpdateResourcePolicy.description: Grants permission to update an existing resource policy for a Lex resource

UpdateSlot.description: Grants permission to update an existing slot

UpdateSlotType.description: Grants permission to update an existing slot type

TagResource.description: Grants permission to add or overwrite tags of a Lex resource

aws:TagKeys.description: Filters access by the set of tag keys in the request

aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the tags in the request

UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a Lex resource

aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the tags attached to a Lex resource

GetBotVersions.description: Returns information for all versions of a specific bot

GetUtterancesView.description: Returns a view of aggregate utterance data for versions of a bot for a recent time period

GetBot.description: Returns information for a specific bot. In addition to the bot name, the bot version or alias is required

GetExport.description: Exports Amazon Lex Resource in a requested format

PostContent.description: Sends user input (text or speech) to Amazon Lex

PostText.description: Sends user input (text-only) to Amazon Lex

PutBot.description: Creates or updates the $LATEST version of a Amazon Lex conversational bot

aws:TagKeys.description: Filters access by the set of tag keys in the request

aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the tags in the request

StartMigration.description: Grants permission to migrate a bot from Amazon Lex v1 to Amazon Lex v2

aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the tags attached to a Lex resource

GetBot.description: Returns information for a specific bot. In addition to the bot name, the bot version or alias is required

GetBotAlias.description: Returns information about a Amazon Lex bot alias

GetSession.description: Grants permission to retrieve session information for a bot alias and user ID

ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to lists tags for a Lex resource

DescribeBotAlias.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing bot alias

DescribeResourcePolicy.description: Grants permission to retrieve an existing resource policy for a Lex resource

DeleteBot.description: Grants permission to delete an existing bot

DeleteBotAlias.description: Grants permission to delete an existing bot alias in a bot

DeleteSession.description: Grants permission to delete session information for a bot alias and user ID

PostContent.description: Sends user input (text or speech) to Amazon Lex

PostText.description: Sends user input (text-only) to Amazon Lex

PutBotAlias.description: Creates or updates an alias for the specific bot

aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the tags in the request

PutSession.description: Grants permission to create a new session or modify an existing session for a bot alias and user ID

StartImport.description: Grants permission to start a new import with the uploaded import file

CreateBot.description: Grants permission to create a new bot and a test bot alias pointing to the DRAFT bot version

CreateBotAlias.description: Grants permission to create a new bot alias in a bot

aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the tags in the request

CreateResourcePolicy.description: Grants permission to create a new resource policy for a Lex resource

DeleteResourcePolicy.description: Grants permission to delete an existing resource policy for a Lex resource

RecognizeText.description: Grants permission to send user input (text-only) to an bot alias

RecognizeUtterance.description: Grants permission to send user input (text or speech) to an bot alias

StartConversation.description: Grants permission to stream user input (speech/text/DTMF) to a bot alias

UpdateBotAlias.description: Grants permission to update an existing bot alias

UpdateResourcePolicy.description: Grants permission to update an existing resource policy for a Lex resource

TagResource.description: Grants permission to add or overwrite tags of a Lex resource

aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the tags in the request

aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the tags attached to a Lex resource

GetBotChannelAssociations.description: Returns a list of all of the channels associated with a single bot

GetBotChannelAssociation.description: Returns information about the association between a Amazon Lex bot and a messaging platform

DeleteBotChannelAssociation.description: Deletes the association between a Amazon Lex bot alias and a messaging platform

GetIntentVersions.description: Returns information for all versions of a specific intent

GetIntent.description: Returns information for a specific intent. In addition to the intent name, you must also specify the intent version

CreateIntentVersion.description: Creates a new version based on the $LATEST version of the specified intent

DeleteIntentVersion.description: Deletes a specific version of an intent

PutIntent.description: Creates or updates the $LATEST version of an intent

GetSlotTypeVersions.description: Returns information for all versions of a specific slot type

GetSlotType.description: Returns information about a specific version of a slot type. In addition to specifying the slot type name, you must also specify the slot type version

CreateSlotTypeVersion.description: Creates a new version based on the $LATEST version of the specified slot type

DeleteSlotTypeVersion.description: Deletes a specific version of a slot type

PutSlotType.description: Creates or updates the $LATEST version of a slot type
